item.title: Best Buy cuts profit outlook due to tariffs, says it already hiked some prices
item.description: Best Buy posted better-than-expected first-quarter earnings but cut its outlook as President Donald Trump's tariffs raise the cost of imported electro...

item.title: Salesforce shares fall as software maker shows pockets of weakness
item.description: Salesforce shares slumped despite topping Wall Street's fiscal first-quarter estimates and lifting its full-year guidance.

item.title: E.l.f. Beauty to acquire Hailey Bieber skincare brand Rhode in deal valued up to $1 billion
item.description: E.l.f. Beauty is acquiring Hailey Bieber's skincare brand Rhode for up to $1 billion as it looks to reach higher-income shoppers.

item.title: Nvidia beats on earnings and revenue as data center sales jump 73%
item.description: Nvidia reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue on Wednesday.

item.title: Salesforce turns in strong results and optimistic forecast
item.description: Salesforce delivered a beat-and-raise quarter even with President Trump's imposition of tariffs on imported goods.
